<li><span class="step-2-imppact2 imppact2 usmle-gs-imppact2 step-2-condensed strongImpactHighlight--qLdOc"><span class="step-1-imppact2 usmle-gs-imppact2 step-1-condensed strongImpactHighlight--qLdOc"><a data-phrasegroup-id="Pk0WLT" class="api tooltip__link" data-type="link" data-anker="Zce0d4554dd0bc7f9fba742d2827ffc63" data-learningcard-id="Xh09cf" data-lxid="Xh09cf" data-title="SHlwZXJ0ZW5zaW9u" id="L056789c9e0d60d5ee1fd80fdd90b1867" data-source="L056789c9e0d60d5ee1fd80fdd90b1867" href="/us/article/Xh09cf#Zce0d4554dd0bc7f9fba742d2827ffc63">Hypertension</a> <span class="wichtig">(<span class="nowrap"><span class="wichtig">≥</span> 140/90 mm Hg)</span></span></span></span></li> <li>
<span class="step-2-imppact2 imppact2 usmle-gs-imppact2 step-2-condensed strongImpactHighlight--qLdOc"><span class="step-1-imppact2 usmle-gs-imppact2 step-1-condensed strongImpactHighlight--qLdOc">And <a data-phrasegroup-id="gN0F0g" class="api tooltip__link" data-type="link" data-anker="Zf8ea53dacdf631df81e9f46e3ead20d1" data-learningcard-id="0Q0euf" data-lxid="0Q0euf" data-title="UHJvdGVpbnVyaWE=" id="L2199d6b76c886a41e6637533a0edcf67" data-source="L2199d6b76c886a41e6637533a0edcf67" href="/us/article/0Q0euf#Zf8ea53dacdf631df81e9f46e3ead20d1">proteinuria</a>, as evidenced by any of the following:</span></span> <ul>
<li>
<span class="linksuggest"><span data-phrasegroup-id="nj17aS0" data-type="bonus" class="api dictionary" data-content="" id="L5cfe2c95c5548a320c31ddc270064d42" data-source="L5cfe2c95c5548a320c31ddc270064d42">24-hour urine collection</span></span>: <span class="step-2-imppact2 imppact2 usmle-gs-imppact2 step-2-condensed strongImpactHighlight--qLdOc"><span class="step-1-imppact2 usmle-gs-imppact2 step-1-condensed strongImpactHighlight--qLdOc"><span class="wichtig"><span class="nowrap"><span data-type="highlight" class="js-relevance-term step-1-imppact0 step-2-imppact0 imppact0 usmle-gs-imppact0" data-qxids="7q04-S;iCaJ75;">≥ 300 mg/24 hours</span></span></span></span></span>
</li> <li>
<span class="linksuggest"><span data-phrasegroup-id="s21tQT0" data-type="bonus" class="api dictionary" data-content="" id="Leed0c0ebf93e44b9d95c67403989f8e0" data-source="Leed0c0ebf93e44b9d95c67403989f8e0"><span data-type="highlight" class="js-relevance-term step-1-imppact0 step-2-imppact0 imppact0 usmle-gs-imppact0" data-qxids="iCaJ75;">Urine protein:creatinine ratio</span></span></span><span data-type="highlight" class="js-relevance-term step-1-imppact0 step-2-imppact0 imppact0 usmle-gs-imppact0" data-qxids="iCaJ75;">: </span><span class="nowrap"><span data-type="highlight" class="js-relevance-term step-1-imppact0 step-2-imppact0 imppact0 usmle-gs-imppact0" data-qxids="iCaJ75;">≥ 0.3</span></span> </li> <li>
<span class="linksuggest"><a data-phrasegroup-id="RPbleF" class="api tooltip__link" data-type="link" data-anker="Zf19b21f407e6e0466b247915f72cf9d8" data-learningcard-id="kg0mv2" data-lxid="kg0mv2" data-section-id="jJX_F_" data-sxid="jJX_F_" data-title="RGlhZ25vc3RpYyBldmFsdWF0aW9uIG9mIHRoZSBraWRuZXkgYW5kIHVyaW5hcnkgdHJhY3Qg4oaSIFVyaW5hbHlzaXM=" id="Lb2408db3175d92e5672e131badf42a7e" data-source="Lb2408db3175d92e5672e131badf42a7e" href="/us/article/kg0mv2#Zf19b21f407e6e0466b247915f72cf9d8"><span data-type="highlight" class="js-relevance-term step-1-imppact0 step-2-imppact0 imppact0 usmle-gs-imppact0" data-qxids="iCaJ75;">Urine dipstick</span></a></span><span data-type="highlight" class="js-relevance-term step-1-imppact0 step-2-imppact0 imppact0 usmle-gs-imppact0" data-qxids="iCaJ75;">: </span><span class="nowrap"><span data-type="highlight" class="js-relevance-term step-1-imppact0 step-2-imppact0 imppact0 usmle-gs-imppact0" data-qxids="iCaJ75;">&gt; 2+ protein</span></span> </li> </ul>
